DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test clinical effectiveness IOE tube use individually customize 3-dimentional printed guide tube alternative Levin tube feed unconscious patient choice tube feeding .
DOC.brief_title: Intermittent Oro-Esophageal Tube Feeding Using Individually-Customized 3-Dimensional Printing
DOC.detailed_description: According standard Guideine videofluoroscopic swallow study ( VFSS ) , Patients refer dysphagia ( swallow dysfunction ) require tube feed medically stable vital sign , agree participate . Participants swallow dysfunction classify three group ( nasogastric tube , traditional intermittent ( IOE ) tube , individual 3D print guide tube ) accord VFSS . Both traditional IOE tube individual 3D print guide tube group receive training procedure prior first feeding . All participant evaluate satisfaction tube feeding ( EORTC QLQ-H & N35 ) 3 day start day tube feed . On day oral feeding , participant evaluate questionnaire clinical examination . If participant discharge state maintain tube feeding , investigated length stay leave hospital . On 1 month , 3 month tube feeding , investigator follow-up measure questionnaires clinical examination .
DOC.criteria: Dysphagia patient check VFSS ( videofluoroscopic swallow study ) Patients participate study agreement Oral feeding possible ( Need tube feed ) Patient reject participation Cricopharyngeal incoordination Impaired esophageal peristalsis Impaired GI tract Observed esophageal reflux
